verses.verse: Unto <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
O my <S%H430>God<s%>, I <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H954>you<s%>: let me not be ashamed, let not my <S%H341>enemies<s%> triumph over <S%H5970>me<s%>.
<S%H6960>Yes<s%>, let none that wait on you be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>: let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> which <S%H898>transgress<s%> without <S%H7387>cause<s%>.
<S%H3045>Show<s%> me your <S%H1870>ways<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H3925>teach<s%> me your <S%H734>paths<s%>.
<S%H1869>Lead<s%> me in your <S%H571>truth<s%>, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>: for you are the God of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; on you do I <S%H6960>wait<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
<S%H2142>Remember<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and your <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>; for they have been ever of <S%H5769>old<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> not the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth<s%>, nor my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: according to your <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> you me for your <S%H2898>goodness<s%>' <S%H3068>sake<s%>, O Lord.
<S%H2896>Good<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: therefore will he <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
The <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H1869>guide<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: and the <S%H6035>meek<s%> will he <S%H3925>teach<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>.
All the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> unto such as <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
For your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H3068>sake<s%>, O Lord, <S%H5545>pardon<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; for it is <S%H7227>great<s%>.
What <S%H376>man<s%> is he that <S%H3373>fears<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? him shall he <S%H3384>teach<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he shall <S%H977>choose<s%>.
His <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3885>live<s%> at <S%H2896>ease<s%>; and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H5475>secret<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is with them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3045>him<s%>; and he will show them his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8548>ever<s%> toward the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; for he shall <S%H3318>pluck<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> out of the <S%H7568>net<s%>.
<S%H6437>Turn<s%> you unto <S%H2603>me<s%>, and have mercy upon <S%H3173>me<s%>; for I am desolate and <S%H6041>afflicted<s%>.
The <S%H6869>troubles<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> are <S%H7337>enlarged<s%>: O bring you me <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H4691>distresses<s%>.
<S%H7200>Look<s%> upon my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H5999>pain<s%>; and <S%H5375>forgive<s%> all my <S%H2403>sins<s%>.
<S%H7200>Consider<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%>; for they are <S%H7231>many<s%>; and they <S%H8130>hate<s%> me with <S%H2555>cruel<s%> <S%H8135>hatred<s%>.
O <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H954>me<s%>: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in <S%H2620>you<s%>.
Let <S%H8537>integrity<s%> and <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> <S%H6960>me<s%>; for I wait on you.
<S%H6299>Redeem<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, out of all his <S%H6869>troubles<s%>.
